messages.message:
Hi all — created another utility script called “Organize metaflow files” — you can read the description and use it in the README.md

Essentially it looks at classes.json and copies those input files to their classes respective directories in the “organized_out_dir”:

https://www.instabase.com/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/tools/bin/OrganizeMetaflow/
That is super useful, could a customer invoke this via api?
Totally yep — this can work for all of our customers + ourselves if they follow the instructions in the README.md
I thought non-admins couldn't launch scripts, is this different because its packaged within in a flow? How does that work>?
Correct when it's in binary form it's read-only so anybody can run the flow
I should called it a Flow Binary instead of a script
From the users perspective it's just a Flow to you
Nice! Recipe book supports flow binaries as a post-flow setup script. So we can bundle this as a metaflow template!!!
